name: RTCPeerConnection.idpassertionerror_event
description: An idpassertionerror event informs the target, a RTCPeerConnection object, that the identity provider (IdP) encountered an error when trying to generate an identity assertion.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
